segments.text: Everything is now . I'm kind of sick of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Each ring has 3 small diamonds inside the band .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oooh ! One for each of the zeros in 2000 ! Wow !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So find a guy to marry and you can get one !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't need a guy to buy a wedding ring !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . You're going to wear one and pretend you're married to try to attract guys .
segments.speaker: S1
